description: Retrieves the details of blueprint runs for a specified blueprint.

nested_items.name: BlueprintRuns
nested_items.description: Returns a list of BlueprintRun objects.

nested_items.name: RunId
nested_items.description: The run ID for this blueprint run.

nested_items.name: WorkflowName
nested_items.description: The name of a workflow that is created as a result of a successful blueprint run. If a blueprint run has an error, there will not be a workflow created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the blueprint run. Possible values are:
Running -- The blueprint run is in progress.
Succeeded -- The blueprint run completed successfully.
Failed -- The blueprint run failed and rollback is complete.
Rolling Back -- The blueprint run failed and rollback is in progress.

nested_items.name: StartedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time that the blueprint run started.

nested_items.name: CompletedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time that the blueprint run completed.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: Indicates any errors that are seen while running the blueprint.

nested_items.name: RollbackErrorMessage
nested_items.description: If there are any errors while creating the entities of a workflow, we try to roll back the created entities until that point and delete them. This attribute indicates the errors seen while trying to delete the entities that are created.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The blueprint parameters as a string. You will have to provide a value for each key that is required from the parameter spec that is defined in the Blueprint$ParameterSpec.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The role ARN. This role will be assumed by the Glue service and will be used to create the workflow and other entities of a workflow.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if not all blueprint runs have been returned.
